name: Salamence
author: kodama
flavor_text: Thanks to its fervent wishes, the cells in its body finally mutated, and at last it has its heart’s desire—wings.

abilities.name: Intimidating Roar
abilities.effect: Once during your turn, you may have your opponent switch their Active Pokémon with 1 of their Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Fierce Dragon
attacks.effect: If your opponent’s Active Pokémon already has any damage counters on it, this attack does 120 more damage.
